channel.title: Run Error
channel.description: "Java" is not recognized as an internal or external command.

item.title: Run Error
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Replace with this:

@echo off title Server java -Xmx1200m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-1.7.0-ga-bin.jar server pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Run Error
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Rush Ags Rush
item.description:
@Ags_Rush wrote:

@echo off title Ags-Rush Java Dexter pause

Changed my environment variables, but it still gives me the same error.

Read full topic

item.title: Run Error
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

`SJ_:

It appears to me you have not installed Java, or you have not set your environment variables. Start -> Control Panel -> System, then click on the ‘Advanced System Settings’ on the left, then the ‘Environment Variables’ button. In the lower section ‘System Variables’, scroll through and find ‘Path’ and double click it. add this at the end of your path ;C:\Program Files\Java\java 1.0_7\bin (or whatever java version you have) and then the error should be resolved.

Hey Scape Java.

Read full topic

item.title: Run Error
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

It appears to me you have not installed Java, or you have not set your environment variables. Start -> Control Panel -> System, then click on the ‘Advanced System Settings’ on the left, then the ‘Environment Variables’ button. In the lower section ‘System Variables’, scroll through and find ‘Path’ and double click it. add this at the end of your path ;C:\Program Files\Java\java 1.0_7\bin (or whatever java version you have) and then the error should be resolved.

Read full topic

item.title: Run Error
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Very common problem made by novices.

Check your Run.bat code and post it here, it may give some help.
Then post your JDK Version.
And just for the kicks, make sure you have your environmental variables set properly.

Read full topic
